complaints.complaint: The new vendor's product is not very good, pls bring back the old vendor
The new vendor's product is not very good, pls bring back the old vendor
complaints.response: We sincerely apologize for your negative experience with our newly launched vendors on behalf of customers who have fallen victim or experienced issues like these in recent years. This kind at-risk service falls short when it comes down befitting standards established by industry standard protocols such as quality assurance. Please accept any feedback we can about how you approach delivering meaningful products through reliable methods including email updates!

complaints.complaint: your employee surya is sending me spam emails, pls look into it
complaints.response: We greatly appreciate you taking these steps to improve our communication skillsets - we never ask customers how they feel about unsolicited email communications from us in the first place. Feedback helps validate company performance!
